text: can there be some css ready classes available in dnd emails? That might help facilitate more custom email modules

Outlook
The top button row (CTAs), the bottom button row (links) using the hs button module.

*Top row:* It looks like when these modules are placed side by side and have padding applied to them, the image-rendered CTAâ€™s width does not automatically factor in the padding. Outlook knowingly ignores max-width and renders images as their defined width.

Is there a solution or workaround?
